overview: Shelley Prendiville (Jessie Urbania) has taken a job as a host for the acclaimed Spanish actress Sofia Santana (Jenasis Serrano) while she’s in the U.S. to discuss her role in a movie. She is also going to be her translator during her meeting with the producer (Henry Gelinas). However, Shelley’s Spanish skills are far less impressive than she’d like to admit and Sofia is less than thrilled about her incompetence.
tagline: If I get this job, it will be a miracle.
title: The Translator
